name: tomato-pie
description: Schedule your time with a clock

scripts.start: cp src/background.js dist/background.js && cp src/manifest.json dist/manifest.json && cp -r src/assets dist && parcel watch src/background.js src/index.html --public-url '.' --no-cache
scripts.build: rm -r dist && rm dist.zip && parcel build src/background.js src/index.html --public-url '.' --no-source-maps && cp src/manifest.json dist/manifest.json && cp -r src/assets dist && zip -r dist.zip dist

author: timqian
